message: Disclaimer: The following response is intended for general informational purposes only and should not be construed as professional architectural advice. For tailored design recommendations that adhere to local building codes, Vastu principles, or any other specific requirements, please consult a licensed architect.

architectural_plan.notes: This modern design for a two-story 5BHK bungalow with an 800 sqft total area includes a rooftop terrace and swimming pool. It is intended to serve as both a joint family residence and a bachelor pad, incorporating Vastu principles by ensuring proper orientation of key rooms (e.g., main living areas towards the south or east) and efficient circulation space.
